resources.string: You don\'t have any browser to open web page
Are you sure you want to delete this playlist ?
Adding tracks to queue. Please wait.
An error occurred when loading the inputs
An error occurred when changing the input
Sorry, we lost the connection with your device, please try to connect again.
Your new settings have been saved. The MiND will reappear in the zones area.
This MiND is not yet configured. Please configure its network settings to be able to enjoy all the features.
Can\'t connect to the MiND. Please check if another controller is already connected, and close that application before trying again.
Your unit is updating. It will reappear on the network in about 10 minutes. Please be patient.
Could not load MiND network settings
The MiND name cannot be empty
An invalid IP address was specified.
An invalid subnet mask was specified.
An invalid gateway address was specified.
An invalid DNS address was specified.
The wep key cannot be empty
Your Wi-Fi password cannot be empty
Are you sure you want to clear the queue?
The network name cannot be empty.
This will automatically clear MiNDs and images cache.
Are you sure you want to clear the images and MiNDs cache?
MiNDs and image cache were successfully cleared
A problem occurred while trying to change the power state, please try again later.
Do you really want to logout ?
An internal error occurred. Please retry.
No track available to add to queue.
App is not currently connected to a MiND. Please try reconnect to your MiND.
App cannot access the MiND queue. Please try reconnect to your MiND.
An error occurred while trying to save playlist.
Cannot save playlist with an empty name. Please set a name.
{0} already exists. Do you want to replace or append to the existing playlist ?
Tracks were successfully added to queue.
MiND queue is loaded at its maximum capacity.
Failed to connect to {0}. Please retry.
Your unit has joined a multiroom group as slave. Please select the group to continue playback.
"{0}" joined a multiroom group as slave. App automatically reconnected to master device "{1}".
MiND app needs location permission in order to find nearby Wi-Fi networks.
MiND app needs location permission in order to find nearby unconfigured MiND.
The {0} permission is required to find nearby unconfigured MiND devices, please allow it from settings page to proceed further.
The {0} is updating. It can take up to 5 minutes. Please be patient.
Language is supported at the moment
Your current MiND device firmware version does not support automatic rename functionality. Please update first.

The current MiND version doesn\'t support automatic updates from the application. Please update your device manually. Upon completion of this step you will then be able to initiate future updates from the application.
An error occurred while trying to rescan the network. Make sure another application doesn\'t use port 1900. Kill all other open process(es) and retry.
{0} library has been disconnected or closes connection. Please select another library...
Preparing local music library, please wait ...
An error occurred while preparing the local music library.
You are not logged in. Please, login first by accessing your music service settings from the libraries list.
Failed to add tracks to queue.
Wi-Fi connection state changed, restarting application ... Please wait.
Connect your device to a Wi-Fi network ...
The application is not authorized to access your media library. Please, give the app access to your media.
A connection to the MiND device is in progress.
Reconnecting to the last connected MiND, please wait...
Update the firmware to get access to Network Settings
Subscribe to Premium to get unlimited skips.
Unable to scan network for MiND devices. Check your Wi-Fi settings.
Allow your mobile device to go in sleep mode when you are listening to music.
Some tracks were not added to the queue as we have reached the queue max capacity.
No USB device found. Please make sure your USB device is connected.
Tap here to open our privacy policy.
Add the MiND controller display outside of your app\'s user interface. Devices with MiND2 only.
Press to open and edit the library parameters
Button Go Back to now playing.
Close the library list ang go back in the main player view.
Open a pop-up window with more options or information.
Press to go back at the root of the navigation.
This will delete the current playlist.
Will go back in the Zones List.
Access to zones and app settings.
Will toggle between play or pause for the current playing track.
Will stop the current playing track.
Will toggle between play or pause for the current playing track.
Will increment the volume by one step, can be held down.
Will decrement the volume by one step, can be held down.
Will toggle mute on or off.
Will skip to the next track in queue.
Will restart the current playing song, hit twice to go the the previous track in the queue.
Will open a menu so you can choose the input on your Moon device, if your device supports it.
Will open a pop-up menu so you can choose to edit, clear or save the current playing queue.
Clear, save or edit the current Queue.
Will open the sliding panel of the Queue so you can skip ahead manually or edit it.
Shuffling of the current queue is off.
Shuffling of the current queue is on.
The current repeat mode is off.
The current repeat mode set to repeat only the current playing track.
The current repeat mode set to repeat the whole queue.
Assign this radio to a preset button on your Moon device.
Choose where to put your current selection in the Queue.
Make sure your MOON device is powered and connected to network then click on one of these options
Click here to launch Diagnostic Tool
Your Moon Model should be displayed on the front plate of the unit.
* Only MiND enabled devices are displayed.
Make your sure your {0} has power.
Make your sure it\'s not on stand by.
You should see a blue light on the front panel.
Make sure your {0} is on this Network : {1}.
Wired or Wi-Fi, your {0} should be on the same network as your mobile device.
To verify the network name manually on your {0}, press the Setup button on the front panel, then navigate on Network, then on Info.
We recommend a wired connection for stability, but wireless is also possible.
Navigate on the "network" input of your {0}.
Make sure there are no messages displayed once the "network" input is selected
If there is, follow the instructions displayed.
If you initiated an updated recently, please allow at least 5 minutes to your MiND to become responsive again.
Proceeding to an advanced search process ...
We did not find any MiND on your network.
Unable to validate MiND search protocol.
Search protocol validated but we did not find any MiND on the network.
We are unable to find your MiND
Please unplug/plug your device power cable and retry.
If not working, try to factory reset your unit. See your manual for guidance.
If you have access to your {0}\'s IP address, enter it here :
If you see your {0}, select it above.
We did not find anything with the address your provided. Are you sure you have the correct IP?
If it\'s not the device you are looking for, please make sure you have entered the correct IP before trying again.
I don\'t have access to my IP address.
Manually search your MiND on the network if you have its IP address.
You can also contact Simaudio for help.
Double tap to show more details
Double tap to find your unit.
Search unit button in disabled state. Enter a valid IP address in appropriate text field to enable it.
Connect Button enabled. Double tap on Connect button to establish the connection.
Submit a request to the support team for assistance.
Mandatory if you want to use a wired connection: Turn off your {0}. Plug an ethernet cable. Turn it on again.
Your MiND is configured as an AirPlay accessory. Therefore, you should use the iOS Home app to configure the MiND.
Your MiND is configured as an AirPlay accessory. Therefore, you should use the iOS Home or Google Home app to configure the MiND.
Your MiND is a Chromecast accessory. Therefore, you should use Google Home or iOS Home app to configure the MiND.
Submit the logs from your mobile device if you previously created a support ticket.
Thank you for submitting your logs. The support team will get back to you as soon as possible.
Please enter a valid email address.
If your device is showing up as unconfigured, you should use a wired connection before using this diagnostic tool.
If your device is showing up as unconfigured, you should use a wired connection before using this diagnostic tool or use your {0} screen to setup the network connection.
Looks like your device is struggling to connect with bluetooth. We recommend getting closer to the MiND device and try again or to use a wired connection to setup the network connection.
Looks like your device is struggling to connect. We recommend using a wired connection or power cycle your MiND device.
Tap here to review the app tutorial.
Tap here to review the newest app features.
We are trying to reconnect with the MiND device.
Reconnecting is taking longer than usual, please be patient.
We are unable to reconnect to the MiND device.
We are unable to sync the properties of the MiND device.
Navigate back to a specific view
Choose below options to play only selected tracks or deselect to play all
Listen on your speakers or TV, using the Spotify app as a remote.
MiND app is missing permission to access local network. This permission is required to discover MiND devices and UPnP servers on your network.
Make sure MiND app has iOS permission to access nearby devices.
You can grant Local Network permission to MiND app from your Apple device Settings -> MiND.
If your {0} is not plugged to ethernet nor configured on Wi-Fi, grant Bluetooth permission to MiND app from your Apple device Settings -> MiND, then turn on Bluetooth and restart the app.
Make sure your MOON device is powered and connected to network. Check also that MiND app has permission to access local network and Bluetooth in iOS Settings.
Press [cancel] to drop the current connection in progress.

It appears that this test previously succeeded. To retry, the tested Wi-Fi configuration must be reset on the mobile device. Beware that on failure, if the password is wrong, the mobile device might be disconnect from the tested Wi-Fi.
Load saved playlists data on cloud database
Send us a screenshot of your bug if you can
Request subject should not be empty
Thank you for submitting a bug for the MiND App
Bug description should not be empty
Your name should not be empty
Email should have a valid format
Bug name should be a text
Bug description should be a text
Your files are too large. Max upload size is 20MB
Email confirmation does not match email provided
We did not find what you were looking for
Something went wrong on our side, please try again later
Undefined. To toggle to editing mode, tap the pencil button.
Please note that MOON can no longer guarantee the compatibility of files stored on your mobile device with your MiND Controller. When iTunes was replaced by Apple Music this feature became obsolete.
We can no longer guarantee the compatibility of this feature.
You may continue playing these files in the Music app. Audio from Music may be transmitted to your MiND via AirPlay, USB, or Bluetooth, depending on the model.
If you enable this feature, this warning will not display anymore. If you remove this feature, it won\'t be available, the next time you load a MiND zone, on this mobile device.
Password or key length is exceeded
You may change your playlist title!
You are not authenticated to the Cloud!
Playlists have been synced successfully with cloud
If you want to edit this playlist, you have to make a copy of it
How may we be of assistance?
Help us to quickly solve the issue by attaching your logs file
Enable devices link for data sync
To be uploaded on the cloud data
To be downloaded from the cloud data
Not visible for other users on my network
Automatically upload and download changes to saved playlists in the cloud. You may change this configuration at any time in the Library Settings.
Try turning Bluetooth off and on again on this mobile device
Track has been added to your playlist successfully!!
This track is already in your playlist.
Disable and enable the Internet of your mobile device.
Allow your mobile device to receive text notifications.
Brings together lists saved on your device and those associated with your device on the data cloud.
